definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: It sees the dead as lovers, too.

sentences.chinese: 對於所有死者的不信神的？

sentences.english: An off-duty police officer is caught on camera at a bar, mocking a man he watched die.
sentences.chinese: 這名警察在酒吧嘲笑一名他正在調查的案件中的死者。

sentences.english: Upon invitation from relatives of the dead, the celestial burial master goes to investigate how the dead died.
sentences.chinese: 收到死者親屬邀請後，天葬師會去了解死者的死因。

sentences.english: Upon invitation from relatives of the dead, the celestial burial master goes to investigate how the dead died.
sentences.chinese: 收到死者親屬邀請後，天葬師會去了解死者的死因。

sentences.english: A conductive spike is created thus causing a dead short.
sentences.chinese: 一導電用大釘釘牢如此創造引起死者。

sentences.english: And all the longings and all the loss can't bring back the dead.
sentences.chinese: 所有的渴望，所有的損失都不可能帶回死者。

sentences.english: Take the dead who will be resurrected on Judgment Day.
sentences.chinese: 就拿審判日的死者來說。

sentences.english: So he appeared in the spirit, in the kingdom of death, not burnt by the dragon's fire, not maimed;
sentences.chinese: 就這樣他出現在了死者的國度，沒有被龍焰毀滅。

sentences.english: The Democratic Presidential hopeful plans to visit the fallen officier's family.
sentences.chinese: 這位民主黨候選人希望能夠慰問死者的家屬。

sentences.english: Since then, the military has given little information about its investigation to the Chens, immigrants who speak no English.
sentences.chinese: 美國軍方几乎不給死者家屬有關死因調查信息。

sentences.english: The communication of the deed is tongued with fire beyond the language of the living.
sentences.chinese: 與死者的交流思想超乎生者的語言之外是用火表達的。

sentences.english: Before the golden tresses of the dead.
sentences.chinese: 當時死者的金髮葬在墓冢。

sentences.english: And she answered, I am indeed a widow woman, and mine husband is dead.
sentences.chinese: 要裝成一個爲死者居喪很久的婦人。

sentences.english: And how is reanimating dead corpses that feed on human beings saving lives?
sentences.chinese: 以及如何利用死者的屍體來幫助人們。

sentences.english: For deaths not designated karoshi the family gets next to nothing.
sentences.chinese: 而不被認爲是過勞死的死者家屬幾乎什麼也得不到。
